data.title: Careers Home
data.text:
Health & Wellness

As a purpose-driven and values-aligned business, we are committed to supporting your physical, mental, and emotional well-being. REI provides affordable and comprehensive medical coverage available to all employees who need it – which includes free preventative care, and reimbursement for lodging, transportation, meals and more for gender affirming, reproductive care.

Career Growth

At the co-op, we help you navigate and thrive in your professional career path through our Learn & Grow program to help enable and empower you in your advancement—regardless of where you are in your journey.

Financial Wellness

Once you have reached your first anniversary and met eligibility requirements, the co-op guarantees a 5% contribution to your retirement account—regardless of whether you contribute or not.

Time Away

We recognize the importance of work-life balance and offer a variety of programs. From sick time to vacation, to a leave

of absence or a sabbatical, take the time you need when you need it.

Perks

We offer employees a lot of unique perks to enjoy at their convenience. These range from ProDeals and free rental gear to paid days off to spend time outside to rest and recharge.

REI and the REI Co-op logo are trademarks of Recreational Equipment, Inc.

REI is committed to fostering a diverse and inclusive environment for employees and job applicants. If you require accommodations to complete the application process, please contact us at jobs@rei.com

REI participates in E-Verify. Details in English and Spanish.

Right to Work Statement in English and Spanish. EEO is the Law Poster in English and Spanish.

Cookies are used on this site to assist in continually improving the candidate experience and all the interaction data we store of our visitors is anonymous. Learn more about your rights on our Privacy Policy page.
